description.lang: The smart combustible gas sensor is designed to detect methane(CH4), and sound alarm to remind people of the danger, it can also send notification to users' smart phone via gateway to remind of people remotely. it adopts Z-Wave wireless transmission technology. With the characteristics of high sensitivity and stablization, it can avoid fire or explosion happened in advance.
Association group 1: Lifeline association group- Maximum supported node is 1.Include command classes: Notification Report and Device Reset Locally notification.

Association group 2: Root Device group(Notification)Maximum supported nodes are 5.1-Notification reports status of gas detected or no gas detected via Lifeline.2-When the sensor detects status change of gas detected and no gas detected, the device will be triggered.
